detail.empty:
Select any Legendary item
to view details here
detail.error: Failed to load detail information. This probably means that your Guild Wars 2 Api Key is not set or that it has insufficient permissions. Please check Settings.

usable.title:
Equipment
Available
usable.desc: Shows the number of non-legendary equipped items which you can replace with a legendary item you already own

needed.title:
Equipment
Acquire
needed.desc: Shows the number of non-legendary equipped items for which you don't currently own a legendary replacement

used.title:
Equipment
Used
used.desc: Shows the number of times legendary items are currently equipped

inventory.title:
Inventory
Non-legendary
inventory.desc: Shows the number of non-legendary bound items in inventories
